### 🌀 Grounding — 5‑4‑3‑2‑1 Senses
> Notice **5 things you can see**, **4 you can touch**, **3 you can hear**, **2 you can smell**, **1 you can taste or imagine tasting**.  
Use this when overwhelm rises or you feel detached. It helps orient you to the present moment.

---

### 🌬 90‑Second Reset — Movement & Breath  
> Stand, roll your shoulders, or walk a few steps. Breathe out slowly longer than you breathe in.  
This short reset calms the nervous system and refreshes attention when your mind starts to spin.

---

### 💚 Attachment Visualization — Signals of Safety  
> Picture a kind expression, warm voice, or comforting memory. Let your body register how *safety* feels.  
This can soften panic and train your system to recognise trustworthy connections.

---

### ✴ Focus Sprint — Two‑Minute Task  
> Choose a tiny action. Set a timer for two minutes and begin.  
When done, mark a small check or reward yourself with a breath.  
Micro‑successes gradually rebuild focus confidence.

---

### 🌿 Gentle Body Scan (Optional)  
> With eyes open or closed, move awareness from feet to head. Simply notice sensations without judging them.  
Use this to re‑establish mind‑body connection before or after emotional work.
